seniority_level.evidence: Job requires a minimum of 3 years of experience in BI/DW projects; no senior title is used.

job_family.evidence: Title is "Data Engineer-Business Intelligence" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, reporting and ETL.

sub_specialty.evidence: Role emphasizes BI/DW projects, reporting, and use of Cognos and ETL tools, which are typical of data‑warehouse work.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management responsibilities or direct reports; focus is on technical execution.

primary_cloud.evidence: Nice‑to‑have skills list includes AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure, indicating exposure to multiple clouds without a clear primary.

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three clouds are mentioned together; no single primary cloud can be isolated.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Experience required with ETL/Data Integration tools (InfoSphere DataStage, Informatica, Azure Data Factory) which are batch‑oriented.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Job description does not reference Airflow, Luigi, Oozie, Dagster, Prefect, or any orchestration platform.

storage_layer.evidence: Focus on BI/DW reporting and Cognos suggests a data‑warehouse storage layer.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restriction is explicitly "Pune, Maharashtra, India" and work model is onsite.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in India, which falls in the APAC region.

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation assistance or requirement is mentioned; role is onsite in Pune.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is marked as not_mentioned and the role is India‑based.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT or student visas; work authorization details are absent.

citizenship_required.evidence: The posting does not specify citizenship or work‑authorization requirements.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is full‑time permanent, implying a standard employee (W2) arrangement.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits such as health, PTO, equity, or learning budget are listed.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No reference to mentorship programs, mentors, or learning from senior staff.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement paths appears in the description.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The job text does not mention internal transfers or mobility within the company.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are referenced.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear separation of must‑have (Cognos, reporting) and nice‑to‑have (cloud platforms, ETL tools) skills.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused on BI reporting and data‑engineer responsibilities without mixing other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skills and 3‑year experience level are realistic for a mid‑level data engineer.
